alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Schuyler, southern Yates and northeastern Steuben Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prattsburg, or 11 miles southwest of Penn Yan, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starkey, Dundee, Tyrone, Pulteney, Italy, Wayne, Guyanoga, Branchport, Himrod and Porter Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
